actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Department of Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit any individual to construct any garment or craft item to be used for display purposes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to industrial homework to permit employers to hire any individual to construct, at any location, any garment or craft item for temporary display purposes at retail premises if the employer meets certain conditions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit any individual to construct any garment or craft item to be used for display purposes, and for other purposes.
